attributes.action: Legistrative law for static caravan holiday home owners.
attributes.additional_details: Government legislation required for the controlling of holiday park companies to the legal rights of holiday home owners in reference to there ownership of said holiday home and reference to actions taken by park companies in respect to tenancy and licensing and the right of unregulated and bureaucratic exploitation by parks and the rights of the caravan holiday home owner legislation has been put in place for park homes but not for holiday park owners this needs to be extended to cover same.
attributes.background: Law needs setting up for the help and legal support for holiday home owners who own static caravans where there rights need changing.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you'd like static caravan holiday home owners to have the same legal rights as people who own park homes, you could start a new petition asking for that.
